reviewText: My little cousins were entertained by this and it made my job of watching them that much easier!
Liked the movie but if I pay for a movie I should be able to download it to my device. I should not have to go to amazon to watch it!! Will never buy another movie from them agine!!!!

We enjoyed this film as it's more than just kid humor/happily ever after.
Story line is creative.
It's not rated G for a reason and probably the reason why adults can sit through it and again, enjoy it.
Our friends kids 4,7,9 and 12 loved it and asked us to play it again for them.
Proof that it's a hit!
Awful, not fit for children. "You're a piece of sh...eep." "Shut up" "stupid" and even more.

I love this movie. My grand daughter just turned 3 years old and we watch it together. No magic which is nice. We even play characters in the movie and go to the make believe space ship in the backyard. I would recommend this movie

Quite possibly one of the worst animated movies we have seen. The ill-conceived plot reinforces racial stereotypes, sexism, and vulgarity. The animation and voice-overs are half-hearted, consistent with the movie itself.

If you can, put this 'Pup' in the doghouse.
My 4 year old granddaughter loves this movie. It's her rating. Why not 5 stars? Who knows? She has different opinions on different days.
cheesy plot and animation is ok- corny. I wouldn't rent it again and don't even think about wasting your money buying it. My 3 year old wasn't impressed either.

Watching with 4 year old and 9 year old.  It's PG for good reason.  Just hear "the d word" as it D@#^ IT".  The animals are "boyfriend/girlfriend", kissing, obsessed with their appearances...  It's complete trash.
